metadata.title: Within Center
metadata.description: Psychedelic-assisted therapy and integration retreat center

hero.title: Within Center
hero.subtitle: Healing through connection, guided by compassion

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Within Center provides a safe, supportive environment for psychedelic-assisted therapy and integration. We guide individuals through transformative healing experiences with clinical care, community support, and lasting integration.

about.title: About Within Center
about.description: A retreat center dedicated to psychedelic-assisted therapy, integration support, and holistic healing.

history.title: Our Approach
history.content: Within Center combines evidence-based psychedelic-assisted therapy with personalized integration support. Our experienced practitioners create a safe container for deep healing work, honoring each participant's unique journey toward wholeness.

programs.title: Our Programs
programs.description: Explore the retreats and therapeutic services we offer at Within Center.

list.title: Guided Retreats
list.description: Multi-day psychedelic-assisted therapy retreats with comprehensive preparation, ceremony, and integration support.

list.title: Integration Sessions
list.description: One-on-one and group sessions to help you process, integrate, and apply insights from your healing experiences.

list.title: Therapy Services
list.description: Individual therapy sessions with experienced practitioners specializing in psychedelic-assisted modalities.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Reach out to learn more about our programs or to begin your healing journey.
